knimeNode.name: Substructure Filter List 2
knimeNode.shortDescription: Splits the input table according to if they do or do not contain at least one substructure from the second output.

fullDescription.intro: A filter that splits the compounds from the input table according to if they do or do not contain at least one substructure from the second output.
fullDescription.option: Column that contains the molecules to be filtered
Column that contains the substructures to be used

ports.inPort: Data table containing the molecules to be filtered.
Data table containing the substructures to be used.
ports.outPort: Data table containing only the molecules that contain at least one of the substructures.
Data table containing only the molecules that contain none of the substructures.
